about_the_game:
This Snow Yeti Pack includes 14 furniture items, 4 clothing items, 2 wigs, and 2 mounts.

The Snow Yeti Pack has an icy collection of 22 snow-themed outfits and furniture items available for you to customize your characters and decorate your homes, sheds, and farms.

Pack includes:
  • Blue Snow Yeti Furniture Set: Blue Snow Yeti Chair, Blue Snow Yeti Lamp, Blue Snow Yeti Bean Bag Chair, Blue Snow Yeti Couch, Blue Snow Yeti Lounge Chair, Blue Yeti Snow Globe, and Blue Snow Globe Lamp
  • Pink Snow Yeti Furniture Set: Pink Snow Yeti Chair, Pink Snow Yeti Lamp, Pink Snow Yeti Bean Bag Chair, Pink Snow Yeti Couch, Pink Snow Yeti Lounge Chair, Pink Yeti Snow Globe, and Pink Snow Globe Lamp
  • Blue Snow Yeti Outfit: Blue Snow Yeti Wig, Blue Snow Yeti Coat, and Blue Snow Yeti Pants
  • Pink Snow Yeti Outfit: Pink Snow Yeti Wig, Pink Snow Yeti Coat, and Pink Snow Yeti Pants
  • Blue Snow Yeti Mount
  • Pink Snow Yeti Mount
